product_name: Sweet Spot Skirts Diamonds are a Girl's B.F.F. Bike Skirt
long_description: The Sweet Spot Skirts Diamonds are a Girl's B.F.F. Skirt is a practical coverup with a flirty flair! Wear it over bike shorts, tights or running shorts when you want a little more coverage. Wear the skirt on bike rides, during yoga or other workout classes, at the beach or even over tights or leggings as casual wear. Reversible design gives you 2 skirts in one. Wrap skirt secures with a double row of snaps and can be adjusted to fit sizes 2 - 14. The Diamonds are a Girl's B.F.F.skirt from Sweet Spot Skirts is designed to wear on the hips, not the waist.
short_description: The Sweet Spot Skirts Diamonds are a Girl's B.F.F. Skirt is a practical coverup with a flirty flair! Wear it over bike shorts, tights or running shorts when you want a little more coverage.
